text:
Rocketrip - NY, NY - www.rocketrip.com

We play a game with employees to get them to love saving money for their companies on business travel. The good news is that it's working! The game is pretty simple: give employees a portion of the savings they generate for the company!

We're hiring across the board: Senior Full Stack Engineers Senior Front End Specialist Senior Quality Engineer

www.rocketrip.com www.rocketrip.com/jobs
